verses.text: Alleluia. Give \w glory|strong="H1935"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* call \w upon|strong="H3847"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name: declare \w his|strong="H3068"\w* deeds among \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Gentiles.
Sing \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w him|strong="H5186"\w*, yea sing praises \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w him|strong="H5186"\w*: relate all \w his|strong="H5186"\w* wondrous works.

Glory ye \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* holy name: \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice \w that|strong="H4325"\w* seek \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord.
Seek ye \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H0784"\w* \w be|strong="H4397"\w* strengthened: seek \w his|strong="H8334"\w* face evermore.

Remember \w his|strong="H5921"\w* marvellous \w works|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3245"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath done; \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wonders, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* judgments \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* mouth.
O ye seed \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Abraham \w his|strong="H5921"\w* servant; ye sons \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Jacob \w his|strong="H5921"\w* chosen.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H4480"\w* God: \w his|strong="H4480"\w* judgments are \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H2088"\w* hath remembered \w his|strong="H0413"\w* covenant \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w ever|strong="H2088"\w*: \w the|strong="H0413"\w* word \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H2088"\w* commanded \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H2088"\w* thousand generations.
\w Which|strong="H1366"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Abraham; \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* oath \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Isaac:

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* appointed \w the|strong="H0996"\w* same \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* law, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* Israel \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w an|strong="H7971"\w* everlasting testament:

Saying: \w To|strong="H7704"\w* thee \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w I|strong="H7665"\w* \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Chanaan, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lot \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* inheritance.
\w When|strong="H6963"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H8064"\w* \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* small number: yea very few, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* sojourners therein:

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H0776"\w* passed \w from|strong="H0776"\w* nation \w to|strong="H0776"\w* nation, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w one|strong="H0776"\w* kingdom \w to|strong="H0776"\w* another \w people|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* suffered \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* hurt \w them|strong="H3318"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* reproved kings \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* sakes.
Touch ye not \w my|strong="H6440"\w* anointed: \w and|strong="H3899"\w* do no evil \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* prophets.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* called \w a|strong="H0834"\w* famine upon \w the|strong="H0834"\w* land: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* broke \w in|strong="H3068"\w* pieces all \w the|strong="H0834"\w* support \w of|strong="H3068"\w* bread.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* sent \w a|strong="H0834"\w* man before \w them|strong="H0834"\w*: \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* sold \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* slave.
They humbled his feet \w in|strong="H1364"\w* fetters: \w the|strong="H2022"\w* iron pierced his soul,
Until \w his|strong="H3045"\w* word came. \w The|strong="H3045"\w* word \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* Lord inflamed \w him|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* king sent, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w he|strong="H2822"\w* released \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ruler \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w he|strong="H2822"\w* \w set|strong="H7896"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* liberty.

\w He|strong="H0410"\w* \w made|strong="H1245"\w* \w him|strong="H1245"\w* master \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w his|strong="H1245"\w* house, \w and|strong="H1245"\w* ruler \w of|strong="H0410"\w* all \w his|strong="H1245"\w* possession.

\w That|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H0622"\w* might instruct \w his|strong="H0413"\w* princes \w as|strong="H0622"\w* \w himself|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H8121"\w* teach \w his|strong="H0413"\w* ancients wisdom.

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* Israel \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* Egypt: \w and|strong="H0120"\w* Jacob \w was|strong="H5656"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* sojourner \w in|strong="H5656"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* land \w of|strong="H5656"\w* Cham.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w increased|strong="H7231"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0776"\w* exceedingly: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* strengthened \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* enemies,

\w He|strong="H8033"\w* turned \w their|strong="H8033"\w* heart \w to|strong="H0369"\w* hate \w his|strong="H3027"\w* people: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* deal deceitfully \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w*.
\w He|strong="H8033"\w* sent Moses \w his|strong="H1980"\w* servant: Aaron \w the|strong="H8033"\w* man whom \w he|strong="H8033"\w* had chosen.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* power \w to|strong="H0413"\w* shew \w his|strong="H3605"\w* signs, \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Cham.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* darkness, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* obscure: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* grieved not \w his|strong="H5414"\w* words.
\w He|strong="H6440"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* waters \w into|strong="H0413"\w* blood, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* destroyed \w their|strong="H6440"\w* fish.

\w Their|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* brought \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* frogs, \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* inner chambers \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* kings.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* spoke, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* divers sorts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* flies \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sciniphs \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5769"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* coasts.

\w He|strong="H0776"\w* gave \w them|strong="H5060"\w* hail \w for|strong="H0776"\w* rain, \w a|strong="H0776"\w* burning fire \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5060"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* destroyed \w their|strong="H3068"\w* vineyards \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fig trees: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* broke \w in|strong="H0430"\w* pieces \w the|strong="H3068"\w* trees \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* coasts.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* spoke, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* locust came, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bruchus, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* which \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* no number.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* devoured \w all|strong="H8552"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* grass \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* \w all|strong="H8552"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fruit|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.
And he slew all the firstborn in their land: the firstfruits of all their labour.
And he brought them out with silver and gold: and there was not among their tribes one that was feeble.
Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them lay upon them.
He spread a cloud for their protection, and fire to give them light in the night.
They asked, and the quail came: and he filled them with the bread of heaven.
He opened the rock, and waters flowed: rivers ran down in the dry land.
Because he remembered his holy word, which he had spoken to his servant Abraham.
And he brought forth his people with joy, and his chosen with gladness.
And he gave them the lands of the Gentiles: and they possessed the labours of the people:
That they might observe his justifications, and seek after his law.
